parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: rels
parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of relationships. Maximum 5 levels. 
 e.g. interfaces,interfaces.ip_address

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
Supports nesting up to 2 levels. 
 e.g {"host_name":"~hhcvi","interfaces":{"ip_address":{"network_address":"~10.10.10"},"name":"eth0"}}

parameters.name: rels
parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of relationships. Maximum 5 levels. 
 e.g. interfaces,interfaces.ip_address
